name: Bug Wheels
description:
Bug Wheels is a Race Game where the player needs to race other bugs on a forest.

Be aware that this project was created on a casual game jam in University (2021 DJD Game Jam).

 Be sure to try it out!

Game made by :
Francisco Almeida
Gabriel Ferreira 
Marlon Faria
Rafael Ferreira 

PS: We used some external resources:

Some assets from Unity Asset Store:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vegetation/low-poly-nature-free-vegetation-134006


Music from Diddy Kong Racing:

Beat on the Drums, by Pickle
